title: Luxury Living in the center of Silicon Valley
posting_body: ['Centrally located in the heart of Silicon Valley and near the Lawrence Caltrain Station, this luxury condo is offering convenience and exceptional resort-style living!', 'Inviting entry w/welcoming foyer reveal expansive great room, casual dining area, and desirable luxury outdoor living space beyond.', 'Well-appointed spacious kitchen is enhanced by large center island w/breakfast bar, ample counter/cabinet space, and pantry.', 'Beautiful master suite highlighted by generous walk-in closet, spa-like master bath w/dual-sink vanity, large luxe shower, and private water closet.', 'Ample second bedroom features dual closets & private bath.', 'Additional features: spacious open office, powder room, in-unit laundry, assigned parking, and large windows overlooking resort.', 'Offering an unparalleled living experience w/a luxury resort-style community featuring exclusive access to third-story pool, hot tub, cabanas, spa, fitness ctr, barbecue areas, club room w/prep kitchen, sky lounge, access to amenities (24,000 sq ft retail), outdoor theater, basketball/sports courts, picnic tables, and parks etc.', 'Security deposit is additional one month rent.']
